data.proxyObjectName: office chair with black mesh back, black seat cushion, and armrests
data.utilizationMethod: Stand beside the chair and use the broad mesh backrest as the drawing area, sweeping the pen across the slightly springy mesh for smooth resistance.

data.proxyObjectName: yellow snack bag of Japanese pea crackers
data.utilizationMethod: Pinch the sealed top edge with thumb and index finger, cradle the body of the bag in the remaining fingers, and squeeze the contents toward the bottom

data.proxyObjectName: transparent plastic umbrella with white curved handle
data.utilizationMethod: Hold the straight shaft just below the curved handle and press the thumb onto the small release button on the shaft

data.proxyObjectName: spray bottle with white nozzle and light blue liquid
data.utilizationMethod: Wrap fingers around the neck beneath the trigger, let the filled bottle act as the head, and swing the base downward for strikes
Clasp the top knob between thumb and forefinger, allowing the cylindrical body to extend downward as the chisel shaft

data.proxyObjectName: metallic ballpoint pen with a clear barrel
data.utilizationMethod: Hold the pen in a standard tripod grip and glide its tip across a surface exactly as you would move a paint brush

data.proxyObjectName: Apple iMac desktop computer with silver aluminum stand
data.utilizationMethod: Press the controller tip against the front edge of the solid aluminum stand while it remains stationary on the desk

data.proxyObjectName: small succulent plant in a yellow ceramic pot
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the rim of the pot, keep the flat pot bottom on the table, and push it gently forward and back over the surface (not sure whether it is applicable)
